definition[0]: if a bird or aircraft swoops, it moves suddenly down through the air, especially in order to attack something
example[0]: The eagle hovered, ready to swoop at any moment.
definition[1]: if the police, army etc swoop on a place, they go there without any warning in order to look for someone or something
example[2]: Drug officers swooped on several addresses in London last night.
definition[2]: a sudden surprise attack on a place in order to get something or take people away â€“ used especially in news reports
example[3]: Police arrested a man in a swoop on his house last night.
